Portfolio About me

About me

My name is Ruslan Panasiuk

My goal is to become Junior JavaScript Developer. I desire to work and study new technologies, approaches and best practices. I am ambitious, reliable, proactive and results oriented person who likes people and teamworking. But most of all I like coding and solving difficulties. I don't have much experience in programming but I have ability to learn fast and I try to practice coding as much as possible.

Web-Development

I can build multiple high quality website & UI projects using HTML5 semantic layout, preprocessors and advanced vanilla JavaScript.

Responsive Web Design

I can create web pages that look good on all devices!. In my work I use responsive and adaptive design with media queries and CSS units - rem, em, vh, vw, etc.

UI/UX Design

I know how to create modern and beautiful design templates for your websites. They will be full of modern, nice, and beautiful effects and designs.

Skills

My favorite tools

HTML5

It helps me to create the skeleton of your site or application, and the fifth version will allow me to create a more SEO-optimized structure of your product.

CSS3

This style language allows me to create any effect or design for your site or application. It is limited only by your imagination!

Java Script

This programming language allows you to animate anything: sliders, windows, tooltips, tabs, receiving data from the server and much more.

Jquery

The Jquery library is not popular now, but sometimes we need to maintenance existing project.

React

This library allows you to create web applications. We can create the most interactive product specifically for your goals.

Node.js

This platform allows you to create a back-end for your product - "brains" that will perform actions that the user does not see.

Mongo.db

It is a non-relational database that will store your website or application data.
